title: Integrations

webEmbed.title: Web Embed
webEmbed.description: Add the AI chatbot to your website
webEmbed.copyInstruction: Copy this code and paste it in the <head> section of your website at
webEmbed.chatbotLoaded: Chatbot loaded! Look for it in the corner.
webEmbed.loadFailed: Failed to load chatbot. Please try again.

mlsWarning.title: MLS Token Required:
mlsWarning.message: You must enter a valid MLS token for this service to work. You can do this in the Configurations tab under MLS API Token.
mlsWarning.note: Note: The token is encrypted upon entry and will not be viewable afterward.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp
whatsapp.description: Register a WhatsApp Business number for your AI agent.
whatsapp.phoneHelper: Enter the phone number with country code. A verification code will be sent via SMS.
whatsapp.sendCodeError: Failed to send verification code. Please try again.
whatsapp.codeSent: Verification code sent! Check your phone.
whatsapp.codeHelper: Enter the code sent to your phone.
whatsapp.verifyError: Invalid verification code. Please try again.
whatsapp.removeError: Failed to disconnect WhatsApp number. Please try again.
whatsapp.removeConfirm: Are you sure you want to disconnect this WhatsApp number?
whatsapp.pinHelper: Choose a 6-digit PIN. Save this â€” you'll need it to re-register this number.
whatsapp.prerequisiteWarning: The phone number must not be active on WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business App. Delete WhatsApp from that phone first if needed.

noSubscription: Please select a subscription to configure integrations.
